titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The weather is thunderous and rainy. It cleared up somewhat before service. I preached three times. 1. At Trinity Church. 2. At the Church of the Epiphany, Winchester. 3. At the Wellesley Ladies College.
The last was an interesting scene â€“ 1000 young ladies with a few young men, 'rari nantes in gurgite vasto' [rare swimmers in troubled waters], formed my congregation.
